attributes.action: REMOVE SELF REGULATION FROM THE (CORRUPT), SO CALLED LEGAL PROFESSION, AND SET UP A TOTALLY INDEPENDANT BODY TO COMPENSATE VICTIMS OF SOLICITOR FRAUD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more people are losing out to crooked, incompetant and corrupt solicitors, and yet the Law Society do nothing at all to compensate the victims. If anything they add insult to injury by "covering up' for any solicitor complained about.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
